blocks.title: Adult Education Program
blocks.subtitle: It's never too late to learn. Advance your career and personal growth with our accessible courses.

blocks.heading: Lifelong Learning
blocks.content:
Our Adult Education program provides accessible, affordable learning opportunities for community members looking to advance their careers, earn credentials, or pursue personal enrichment.

We offer flexible scheduling with evening and weekend classes, and many courses are available online.

blocks.subheading: Explore our range of educational offerings

blocks.heading: Enrollment Information
blocks.content:
Schedule: Classes meet Monday & Wednesday evenings (6-8 PM) or Saturday mornings (9 AM - 12 PM)

Cost: Most core courses are free. Some specialty courses have a small materials fee.

Enrollment: Open enrollment throughout the year. Some courses have specific start dates.

Requirements: Must be 18 or older. No prior education required for most courses.

blocks.heading: Start Your Learning Journey
blocks.text: Contact us to learn about current course offerings and enrollment.
